property.name: redirectPage
property.label: Redirect Page Name
property.description: Page name user is redirected to after login submission.

property.name: emailTypeString
property.label: Email Types
property.description: Comma separated list of email types

property.name: phoneTypeString
property.label: Phone Types
property.description: Comma separated list of phone types

property.name: addressTypeString
property.label: Address Types
property.description: Comma separated list of address types

property.name: emailTemplateDeveloperName
property.label: Email Template Developer Name
property.description: Email template to use for post-registration email
